title: Black Circle for Record
description: A record icon, displayed as a circle.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's record button emoji is a vibrant, perfectly circular red icon, radiating a sense of immediate action and importance. Its glossy 3D shading and subtle highlights create a tangible, almost tactile feel, characteristic of Apple's design language. On Apple devices, this emoji clearly signifies the start of recording, whether for audio, video, or a live broadcast, prompting users to capture moments.
